DoubleField.tooltip: Enter a hypothetical investment amount to be used for calculating simulated historical performance.

AbstractField.tooltip: Specify the percentage of the Investment Amount to allocate toward long positions.

WeightSliderConfiguration.title: % of long positions
WeightSliderConfiguration.helpHint: Use slider value to limit relative composition of the long portfolio.

WeightSliderConfiguration.title: % of short positions
WeightSliderConfiguration.helpHint: Use slider value to limit relative composition of the short portfolio.

TripleComboField.displayHint: Limit how much of each industry is represented in long positions and/or short positions in the portfolio.

ListFilter.displayHint: Note: In cases of equal rating, larger cap company is given priority.

WeightSliderConfiguration.helpHint: Use sliders to select ranking provider weights.

AbstractField.displayHint: Note: In cases of equal rating, larger cap company is given priority.

AbstractField.tooltip: Specify how long positions will be selected for portfolio. For example, choosing 'the top' and '10' means that long position in the top 10 ranked products will be opened.
Specify how short positions will be selected for portfolio. For example, choosing 'the bottom' and '10' means that short position in the bottom 10 ranked products will be opened.
The relative stock positions will be equal, or proportional to their ranking, upon each rebalance.
Rebalance will occur at the market close on the n-th weekday, or week-end, month-end, quarter-end or year-end.
A period in the past to test strategy in
An instrument to compare strategy result with

SidecarScannerTemplate.name: US Movers
SidecarScannerTemplate.description: A "dual sorted" scan, displaying stocks with the greatest negative percent change on the left, and positive percent change on the right.

SidecarScannerTemplate.name: US Active
SidecarScannerTemplate.description: Displays stocks with the greatest daily volume today.

SidecarScannerTemplate.name: US ROE
SidecarScannerTemplate.description: Scans for major US corporations with the strongest Return on Equity over the most recent 12 months.

SidecarScannerTemplate.name: Europe Movers
SidecarScannerTemplate.description: A "dual sorted" scan, displaying stocks with the greatest negative percent change on the left, and positive percent change on the right.

SidecarScannerTemplate.name: Europe Active
SidecarScannerTemplate.description: Displays stocks with the greatest daily volume today.

SidecarScannerTemplate.name: Asia Movers
SidecarScannerTemplate.description: A "dual sorted" scan, displaying stocks with the greatest negative percent change on the left, and positive percent change on the right.

SidecarScannerTemplate.name: Asia Active
SidecarScannerTemplate.description: Displays stocks with the greatest daily volume today.

SidecarScannerTemplate.name: US FUT Movers
SidecarScannerTemplate.description: A "dual sorted" scan, displaying futures with the greatest negative percent change on the left, and positive percent change on the right.

SidecarScannerTemplate.name: Europe FUT Movers
SidecarScannerTemplate.description: A "dual sorted" scan, displaying futures with the greatest negative percent change on the left, and positive percent change on the right.

SidecarScannerTemplate.name: Asia FUT Movers
SidecarScannerTemplate.description: A "dual sorted" scan, displaying futures with the greatest negative percent change on the left, and positive percent change on the right.

SidecarScannerTemplate.name: US INDEX Movers
SidecarScannerTemplate.description: A "dual sorted" scan, displaying indexes with the greatest negative percent change on the left, and positive percent change on the right.

SidecarScannerTemplate.name: Europe INDEX Movers
SidecarScannerTemplate.description: A "dual sorted" scan, displaying indexes with the greatest negative percent change on the left, and positive percent change on the right.

SidecarScannerTemplate.name: Asia INDEX Movers
SidecarScannerTemplate.description: A "dual sorted" scan, displaying indexes with the greatest negative percent change on the left, and positive percent change on the right.

SidecarScannerTemplate.name: Dividend Yield
SidecarScannerTemplate.description: This scanner lists equities with the richest dividend yields.

SidecarScannerTemplate.name: Imbalance
SidecarScannerTemplate.description: A "dual sorted" scan listing the largest Auction Imbalances to buy and to sell. This scanner only displays values during NYSE, ARCA and NASDAQ auctions.

SidecarScannerTemplate.name: Reg Imbalance
SidecarScannerTemplate.description: A "dual sorted" scan listing the largest ratio of Regulatory Imbalance to Average Daily Volume. This scanner only displays values during NYSE closing auctions.

SidecarScannerTemplate.name: Russia ETF
SidecarScannerTemplate.description: This scan displays the set of U.S. ETFs whose holdings focus exclusively on Russian equities.

SidecarScannerTemplate.name: P/C Volume
SidecarScannerTemplate.description: A "dual sorted" scan that displays equities with the highest and lowest Put/Call Volume Ratio.

SidecarScannerTemplate.name: IV/HV
SidecarScannerTemplate.description: This dual-sorted scan identifies equities whose options currently have the highest and lowest implied volatilities versus their historical 30 day volatilities.

SidecarScannerTemplate.name: Alternative Energy
SidecarScannerTemplate.description: This scan displays the set of U.S. publicly traded corporations in the Alternative Energy industry.

SidecarScannerTemplate.name: Option Volume
SidecarScannerTemplate.description: Displays equities with the highest option volume today.

SidecarScannerTemplate.name: IPO Stocks
SidecarScannerTemplate.description: Displays equities sorted by the IPO date.

SidecarScannerTemplate.name: Net Social Sentiment
SidecarScannerTemplate.description: A "dual sorted" scan displaying stocks with greatest negative Net Social Sentiment on the left, and greatest positive Net Social Sentiment on the right. Net Social Sentiment is the difference between positive and negative social news count for a company.

SidecarScannerTemplate.name: Complex Orders and Trades
SidecarScannerTemplate.description: Display Native Combo Orders and Trades
